pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Alternative Interpretation of Named Vectors // An alternative interpretation of named vectors as generalized tables, so that c(a=1,b=2,c=3) + c(b=3,a=-1) will return c(b=5,c=3). Uses 'disordR' discipline (Hankin, 2022, doi:10.48550/ARXIV.2210.03856). Extraction and replacement methods are provided. The underlying mathematical structure is the Free Abelian group, hence the name.
